Title: Always emulate the Ma Hengchang Small Team
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社), Beijing
Notes: Ma Hengchang (马恒昌, 1908-1985) was a famous model worker in the early 1950s. He worked at the Machinery Factory nr 5 in Shenyang (Liaoning), and surpassed the production goals set to his team in the context of the 'Patriotic Labour Competiton' supporting the Korean War.
